1.content:
Your eyes hurt, staring at the giant black sun above you. It’s been so long since you’ve been stranded, and you hated every second of it. You stopped tracking days, and just feel the time pass. The supplies in your lifeboat almost out as you’ve been trying to keep them right. You were no survival man, but you know sea water is not good for you.

It was so weird, the storm came out of nowhere. If you knew it was coming, you would not have taken the cruise. It was made for young singles in order to get young love. Funnily enough, because of it you are going to die alone.

You were by yourself on the boat, as no one else was on before it got cut off. You were trying to prepare it, but you sort of got out with it.

You quickly sit up, moving and looking at the rations you had left. Only for a little bit more, and you were feeling hungry.

You are gonna be dead in a couple of days. Might as well eat some now, no point dying hungry.

You need a miracle right now, luckily for you, a miracle is gonna be exactly what you get.

-

“Come on Vaporeon, I want to go now!” The young girl said, stomping her feet. She has been wanting to go for the past five minutes, having her towel and sunscreen on. She managed to get her oldest sister to take her to the beach, however for Vaporeon it had more preparations.

“Calm down Eevee, I will be out in a minute.”

“But I don’t want to wait a minute!” The brown girl whined. “I want to go now!”

Vaporeon heard her little sister, and frowned. She might as well just go now, as she knows how annoying her sister can be when she whines.

She looked at herself in the mirror one final time, growing a smile as she looked over herself. With a big pair of tits and a bis juicy butt behind her, she was glad about her body. The bikini she was wearing was only making it better.

Grabbing her own towel she joined her sister. The young girl pouting.

“About time, what took you so long?” Who only got a laugh and a head pat.

“You’ll understand when you are older, now let’s go.”

With that, they left their home. Taking the short path down to the beach. Eevee was practically jumping around as they get going, and she made her way down to the ground. Stepping onto the sand under her furry foot and running ahead. A big smile on her face as she dropped the towel on the sand.

She practically tripped down into the water with how fast she was going, and she collapsed.

“Eevee! Remember not too far!” Vaporeon yelled, making sure as she needed to watch her sister. With an unrolling of her towel, she laid down. taking her glasses and putting it there. While she was a fantastic swimmer, she was as glad to just rest on the beach under the warm son. A little disappointed though, seeing there was no other Pokemon.

While Eevee, she was having fun in the water. Swimming under and feeling the waves over her large ears. She has always been told to never go past where she can touch, but little did her bigger sister’s know, she’s done it time and time before. A happy and playful snicker as she does it now. A couple of centimetres where she can’t touch.

That’s about as far as she goes, until today though. Cause her eye spotted something even further away. Something she did not expect. It was a toy?

-

As you finish out the orange and toss the peel into the pile, you lay down onto your back. If you are going to die, at least you won’t have scurvy. Not to mention your potassium will be great due to all the banana’s you have.

Closing your eyes, you will just rest in the sun, not really having any other things to do at this point. You just relax, for a long while. Until you heard something the peaked your interest, it seemed to sound like heavy waves?

-

Eevee made sure her sister didn’t see her swimming that way, as she moved over and got into the deep end. Far from where she could touch. This was because her child like curiosity has gotten the better of her, and she wants to know what it is. The closer she got, the more it looked like a little boat. One that left her curious. What is a toy boat doing by itself.
 She would inspect it, but she can’t do that when she is swimming. She will have to drag it more back to sore. So when she got real close, she brought her hand around and grabbed it. Her body turning as she dragged it back to where she could stand.

-
 For you though, you almost had a heart attack! The heavy waves sounded like they got closer and closer, when all of a sudden a monster’s hand came from the water! Swinging around and grabbing the edge of the boat. Her wrist above you as you froze like you were in a freezer.

You have no idea if you were seeing a mirage, or if this was true. That answer became clear when the thing pulled the boat! Tremendous speed as you feel it pull the boat. Water dripping from the wet brown fur down onto your face as you were confused.

 What grabbed you? Was a sea monster? Sea monsters didn’t have fur right, they had tentacles. Or at least you assumed.

Eventually it stopped, coming to a stop as you trip. You see another hand come around, right next to the other one. Finally something raised up, and you saw the face of the sea monster.

It was not what you were expecting, as it ...

11.content:
... was a little girl! Well not really little, or a normal girl either. She was furry with two shades of brown over her body, her face young and curious. She seemed more like a normal animal than a sea monster. Only humanised.

You look around once again, seeing more of her torso. Was she wearing clothes? What kind of weird place are you in now. Are you dreaming? Are you hallucinating?

For Eevee herself, she looked down onto the toy boat, seeing a small little creature on it. She was left confused and stunned about it, as she did not expect to see anything on it, and especially not something she recognised it. It wore dirty clothes, and had little hair. Only the top of it’s head a bit on the mouth. It was on two feet just like her and her sisters.

She’s always been a curious girl and she brought her face down closer to the creature. Seeing him on his feet freak out as he backs several times, trying to get his distance with fear.

“G-Get away from me! Whatever you are!” You say to her as you were thinking about jumping overboard. The sharks were not gonna be as threatening as this girl is.

“You can talk!” She said, her voice being loud as you looked at the monster. It can talk, she can talk? You looked at each other for a couple of seconds until you heard another girl’s voice yell out from the distance.

“Eevee! Where are you!?”

She turned her head and yelled back, basically deafening you. “Right here Vaporeon!” She said as you were a bit confused. Eevee, Vaporeon? Defiantly not human names, what were these things.

She turned her brown eyes back onto you and you froze under her gaze. What was she planning to do? Suddenly she brought her fingers forward and right to you. You could do nothing at the scary sight as she grabbed you between her fingers. Of course you try to squirm and fight your way out, but comparing how big her fingers are to how small you are that is useless. You would barely be three inches tall!

She brought you out of the boat and right in front of her eye, hanging you there for a couple of seconds as you froze. What was she going to do to you?

Eevee was deciding something. You were far too interesting for her to ignore. She needed to take you back to her room, it was just a matter of how? She didn’t want her older sister to find you.

Eventually she decided, hiding you in her one piece would be the best thing to do. Leaning her face in she began to talk to you in her fingers. “Can you please not move for like... a couple of minutes. I’ll try to take your toy boat with me.”

Your eyes go wide at what she was saying, and you barely had enough time to act, as she then brought you around. Her fingers at her one piece swimsuit digging at the side right near her arms. She opened it up and you were plunged right in! Unable to do anything as you feel a wet blanket of fur up against you.

And then the snap of her one piece pushed you in even further, as you were basically pinned to Eevee’s body, unable to do something, or at least anything.

You were up against her hip at the moment, feeling your body against it. She moved around and started to leave the water. Stepping onto the beach and going to her sister.

“Hey big sis, is it okay if I go back to the house?”

“What, we just got here. You were so annoying about going to the beach, and now you just want to leave? What’s that in your hand?” Her sister said leaning up, her boobs bouncing.

“It’s a toy boat, I wanna put it back in my room. Please!”

“Sure, you can make the way back yourself.” Her sister said waving him off, going down and laying on her towel. Eevee grabbed hers and quickly made it back to the home. They all lived near the beach, as it was just a short ten minutes walk down a path to the beach. Hence is why her older sister felt okay with letting her go.

Eevee made her way over, stepping off the sand and onto the dirt path as she cleaned herself with the towel. Until finally she was out of sight and moved on.

Surrounded by trees, she moved the boat on top of the towel and reached into her side. Fishing around for you as she tried to get you.

You get grabbed and lifted out. Feeling a bit of rug burn as she was doing this. You were zoomed around in the air so fast you barely had time to see what was going on.

Eventually you were brought and dropped onto your boat. Landing hard on the wood as you instantly became panicked. Looking up you could see the brown girl once again holding the boat. This time her background has changed, as you could see gigantic trees behind!

“Sorry about taking you like that,” She said, her eyes and smile now friendly as it lowered your guard just a bit. “I just needed to get you and your toy boat out the water. We are on the way back to my home, I’ll sneak you into my room so we can talk.”

“R-Right.” You say a bit weary of her. She noticed this, but did not speak up about it. You were scared, it made sense given the size. This girl looked about 11... maybe 12. Her body yet to develop, although little do you know it’s already started. “What are you?”

“I was gonna ask the same thing to you, I’ve never seen someone so small! My name is Eevee by the way.

“Yeah ...

111.content:
... My name is (Your Name.) I’m a human. Do... you know what a human is?” You say just making sure, however she didn’t really give you an answer, but instead a confused face. You sighed about this, as that was not something you wanted. “So I wind up on a weird island with giant furry girls, what a weird world.”

“So why were you in a toy boat?” Eevee questioned as she had her eyes on you. It was a bit unnerving but you answered the question.

“It’s not a toy boat, it’s an actual boat. I was in a shipwreck and... well i’ve been by myself for the past couple of days.” You say to her as she listens. Was there more tiny people like you.

You were gonna keep talking about it, but suddenly a shadow came in. Turning your head, you could see the massive two story house! Holy crap! It was almost unbeilable how big this thing looked. Normal size it would be considered a mansion, but to you... it was other worldly.

Your eyes wide open, you couldn’t help but stare. If you weren’t aware enough, you wouldn’t of heard.

“Oh your back Eevee.” A voice say as you instinctively ducked down. Hiding on your stomach and out of sight.

Eevee reacted too, but it was far later, her eyes going to you to see you hiding. She breathed a sigh of relief as she looked over to see her sister Leafeon! Crouching down in front of the door watering her flower bed.

“Oh, hey.” She said, her eyes going to you. Her smile giving her a warm smile.

“Did you have fun down at the beach with Vaporeon?” She questioned, making a hole as she plants some seeds. Due to her and her alone, the outside of the home was covered with flowers, plants, vegetables and fruit trees. She loved nature, and she loved her work.

“Uh... yes I did. I’m gonna go to my room now.” Eevee said making her way to the door, about to walk in as she got stopped.

“Not so fast.” Her big sister said standing up. “You are still dripping a bit, you can’t go in wet.”

“Oh w-w-w-”

“Let me help you with that.” Leafeon said with a smile, making her way and grabbing the towel from her sister. “Arms up!”

Eevee listened and raised her arms and the boat high. Her sister then gave her a wipe down, drying her sister as she wore a smile. Eventually the little brown girl got clean as Leafeon smiled. You looking down and seeing her sister, as she looked nice. Loose clothes, a friendly smile and kind eyes

“There, all clean. Now make sure to put that in the laundry.” She said, trying to put her sister in a good habit.

“Okay I will, thank you Leafeon, you’re the best!” She said as she made her way in, thankful that you didn’t get spotted. She stepped inside and you couldn’t help but peak out, seeing the giant home.

“H-How many sister’s do you have?”

“Seven.” She said as your eyes went wide. Suddenly, you began to get a lot worried. So many. She was going to go upstairs, but first she had to put the towel away. That was her first priority.

She moved and you saw the world zoom by, far faster then you could even see. She moved so far that your view zoomed from the hallway to the kitchen to one of the two bathrooms. She got inside and dropped the towel in there.

Only for something to cover Eevee’s eyes. You tried to look, but only saw a ribbon?

“Guess who~”

“Sylveon!” Eevee said with a giggle, as she got turned around (With the boat.) She moved around and you could see another one of her sisters. Pink, and... well curvy. Her breasts were... absurdly huge. To the point where they were more like balloons. Staying down of course.

“You’re back already, I was gonna join you down there, darn!” The perky girl said as Eevee giggled, something she does often with her sister. She was always so fun to be with. Pausing she remembered you, her eyes shifting to your hiding form.

Sadly her sister also did. “Woah what is that! A boat! Can I see? Can I see?” She said, the girl getting worryingly close.

“N-No!” She said suddenly, getting a confused face. “I mean... Vaporeon is still down at the beach. If you go now maybe you can catch her and have fun down there. Maybe?” Eevee said trying to hide you.

“Hmm... I guess so. I’ll have to get a bikini and a quick change! Bye Eevee!” Her sister said as she got moving.

Eevee quickly walked back, moving and moving as she left the laundry, only to pause.

You were curious about this, as you brought yourself up to see where you were and why she stopped.

You two were in the kitchen and... it was just one sister after another.

This time it was a yellow one, with spiky hair and fur, and in a training bra. Of course she was. She was drinking down water pretty heavily.

While Eevee was freezing for a good reason. Jolteon with a little harmless guy is not good. Eevee gets picked on hard enough, you don’t need that either. With a run, Eevee escaped running through the room. She ran for a long while as she got up the stairs, until she entered her room. Breathing a sigh of relief as she was finally there.

Her eyes turn down to you, seeing your laying body. Little did she know, all that running was throwing you around heavily. She moved over and sat down onto the bed talking.

“Hey... you okay?”

“Too many sisters.” You say simply. “There’s those three, then the one down at the beach, plus three more.”

“Don’t worry, I’ll keep you safe in here okay.
111.title: 3: Going To The House

1111.content:
So your life has taken a interesting turn, are you really okay with this giant little girl looking after you? Well you don’t really have any other options, and she seems nice. A bit embarrassing but it’s better than nothing.

“So..” She said down to you. Her eyes directly on you. “A-Are you hungry?”

“Uh... yeah a bit, but-”

“Great! I’ll get you some food!” She said jumping and excited. She put you and the boat to the side as you panic for a quick second.

“H-Hey wait! Eevee you don’t need to!” You yelled, but it landed on death ears as she did not listen. She ran out and closed the door There was a small gap, but you weren’t gonna risk it. Truth is you had food in the boat you can eat, so she didn’t need to. But she was.

-

As Eevee ran down the room, she planned on just getting you some bread that Leafeon has grown, however she got stopped by another sister.

“Eevee, can you come in here!” A voice said. The young girl back up slightly, seeing her sister at the bathroom door.

“Hey, what’s up Glaceon?” Eevee questioned, only to get grabbed and pulled in. “Whahhh!”

“Hold still Eevee. I’m just fixing those eyebrows.” Glaceon said leaning in, with tweezers.

“My eyebrows, what’s wrong with them?”

“Their far too bushy! Just stay still and i’ll fix them. Remember you owe me.” Glaceon said as Eevee broke free.

“No thanks, i’m good.” She said, knowing the danger of owing Glaceon.

“Hey, come back!” Glaceon yelled as he sister just ran away, not thinking much of it.

-

You’ve decided to just wait for her, and not eat your little food. She seemed excited to get you some, so you will just have to wait. Although you do get the joy of looking around the room. Nothing out of the ordinary about it, although it seemed not to have technology in it, not like you were expecting it. She had a bunch of clothes on the ground, a lot.

“Geez, this girl’s a bit dirty. She’s young so that makes sense.” You keep talking to yourself, as you’ve grown accustom to it with your time of isolation.

That became a problem, as you heard a sound and freaked out. It was the door creaking open! You dive right down, underneath as you were hiding. Was that Eevee? Was the one of her sisters?

Raising your head, you barely look up as you see the giantess. She had black fur, with yellow highlights. Even in her eyes, as it was as bright as a cats. The thing that scared you, was how emotionless she was. You couldn’t even read her expression. Nor could you tell if she actually saw your or not. Maybe talking to yourself alerted her, cause that would be dangerous.

Eventually, she gave up. As she simply walked away, her expression not changing one bit. She left and you breathed a sigh of relief.

too scary.

-


As Eevee walked her way into the kitchen, Jolteon wasn’t there, but two other sisters were.

“Hey Espeon, do we have any sweet bread left?” Eevee asked her sister, who was reading. The girl’s favourite pass time.

She lowered her glasses. “Third column, second row draw wrapped in a paper bag tied in a reef knot.”

“Oh uh... thanks.” Espeon was always the kind to give more information needed. She went back to her book as she looked where was instructed. Digging in and grabbing it. She pulled a slice out as she turned to her other sister. “Hey Flareon, can you heat it up for me.”

Her older sister jumped a bit, little startled at the sudden attention to her. Hiding one eye behind her long hair and talked. “W-Well, I guess. B-Bring it here.”

Eevee smiled. She brought the bread in front and was ready for her to heat it up. Although she had to turn her head. Flareon didn’t really have the confidence to due it with an audience. As one of the oldest sister, she was the most shy and scared. Eevee was able to piece it together.

After all, Flareon growing up had both Vaporeon and Jolteon to deal with, and they would not be nice.

“D-Done.” She said as Eevee turned, seeing the bread now hot. She grabbed it and smiled.

“Thanks Flareon! Bye, i’ll be in my room.”

“Change out of your swimsuit.” Espeon commented, not raising her eyes from the book. “It isn’t proper anymore.”

“Fine.” She said with a laugh, moving ahead. She went to her room as she broke in. Closing it once again with a smile. “Hey... i’m back.”

“Thank goodness.” You say back to her, raising up off the boat. “I thought you were your weird sister.”

“Umbreon, you met Umbreon?” She questioned as you laughed. Seems like everyone thinks of her as weird.

“Yeah, she might have heard me, not sure. What you got there?

“Oh, it’s bread!” She said happily and with a smile. She moved around and grabbed you putting you on her lap and out of the boat. She put you onto her lap as she then broke a size off, giving it to you. “Sweet bread that is, take a bite it’s really good!”

You listen and do just that, take a bite with a smile. “Hm... so good.” You say to her as she wore a smile, taking a huge bite out of the rest herself. You could see her take a big bite as you were a bit stunned. Guess that’s what happens when you have a bigger mouth.

You two ate for silence in a long while until you ate all you could. Half of your small piece, only half.

You bring it back and talk to her. “So... i’m staying with you?”

“Wha- Of course yes! Was that not clear before. I want you here”

“Like as a pet or...”

“No...
1111.title: 4: Rest Of The Sisters

11111.content:
... As my little friend.” She said with a smile, a smile that calmed you down a lot. She’s a nice giant girl, and well, you are fresh out of options. You don’t even know where you are, or if you are on Earth anymore. Eevee has never seen a human before, so it is up in the air.

“I’d like that.” you say to her as she smiles as well. That was exactly what she wanted to hear. “Still, if you set up like a little box for me to live in, that would be nice.”

“A box? I might have one of those around.” She said as she put you to the side as she got up. Some bread in her mouth as she goes looking around her room, eventually finding just that, a cardboard box. “This good?”

Y-Yeah.” You say as it was at least from your perspective like a giant house. Still you had a question. “Hey, where did you get cardboard?”

“Oh from the village, it’s not too far away. My sister Glaceon. She got whatever was inside and gave me the box. It was the weirdest thing too, inside of it was a weird looking pink thing. The shape of a zucchini.”

“Okay, moving on!” You say to her as she listens. Putting the box onto the ground and grabbing you. She shifted you around and brought you down, placing you in the middle as you look around. “It’s pretty nice. Could use some things in it. Do you have doll stuff or something?”

“No, but I can still fill it up! Like with this!” She said moving over and grabbing something. She placed it next to you and you could see a giant white sock, with brown fur over it.

It was better than nothing, so you move down onto it. “Uh... i’d rather a clean one but still, comfy.”

“I’d get that, but first I got to switch my clothes, just wait in there okay!?” Eevee said as she then got up. Going away from you. You couldn’t see much from your point of view as she changed, and you were okay with that. Although every now and then, her wagging tail came into view for you, the giant brown tail moving. When Eevee came back, she was in much more casual clothes. A loose white tan top as well as blue booty shorts. She looked like a normal girl her age, well except for the brown fur, the animal ears and the tail.

“Okay i’m back what have you been thinking about?”

“Well nothing much, those are pretty annoying.” You say to her, pointing to the cardboard flaps that have been open. They hung over it and blocked part of your view from the outside world.

“It does, well let me fix that!” She said happily as she leaned her way forward. Leaning forward and ripping the flaps off. To the point where you had no room. To say her little display of strength didn’t scare you would be an outright lie.

She wore a smile as she asked. “Better?”

“Yeah it is.” You say as she grabs the box. Your whole shaking around as you trip. She lifted the box up and put it down at the foot of her bed. “There, you can stay there. So my sister’s wont see it.”

“G-Great.” You say as you lay down onto the sock. You need a rest. You may have been at sea for a long while but this experience has been weirder. You plan to just relax at that point, however when you opened your eyes you could see Eevee peering her way down into the box, Big and bright as you looked back at her.

“Eevee?”

“Are you going to sleep?” She questioned.

“N-Not sleep, just a rest. Been through a lot.” You say to her as she understands, although it was not something that she liked.

“Oh... okay, I just thought now that we’ve set everything up we could have some fun.” She said, a bit disappointed about it. You looked back to her for a little while before sighing.

“Eevee, you want to play?”

“Oh my gosh! Yes!” She said fast, bringing her fingers down and grabbing you. You were flown around by her hand, but only for a little while, cause she brought you where she wanted you to be.

You were thrown around as she placed you onto the ground. Right by her furry soles.

She then stood up, and it was at this point you saw her at her full height. It was insane. She was much bigger than you thought, and you felt much smaller.

“Hey... before we play what do you want me to do with this?” She questioned grabbing the boat.

You got over your worryness as you replied. “I’ve spent the past days in that boat all day, I frankly don’t want to see it.”

“Hmm... I might keep it. Maybe it can be a fun toy when i’m down the river or beach.” She said as she brought it to the bottom of her bed and stuffed it under, with so many others. It wasn’t intentional, but she did give you quite the view of her lingering butt over you.

Not something you wanted to happen, just something that happened.

Eventually she came back and clapped her hands together. “Okay, let’s play a game!”

“Fine, but after that you got to let me rest, I really need one.”

Eevee was considerate, so of course she let this happen. “Deal, but I get to pick the game, and you can’t argue about it!”

“Deal.” You say back as she was really a kind girl. Guess her parents raised her right, or all her sisters. You were still a bit confused about this family dynamic.

“Okay, so i’ve decided, that we are... going to play stomp!!!!” She said, happily waiting for your reaction.

“S-Stomp.” You say filled with nervousness.
11111.title: 5: Bonding With Eevee

111111.content:
“It’e real simple,” Eevee explained to you with raising her finger. “You have to run around, and i’m going to have to try and stomp on you! You can’t leave this room, or go under anything. We will see how long you can do it!” She said as this was something that worried you immensely. “Don’t panic though, I promise to step on you softly. To the point where it will feel like a pillow. So you up for it.”

“I-I guess.” You say back to her. “As long as you don’t plan on trampling me, it should be fine.”

“Game starts now!” She said eagerly, almost like she couldn’t wait to start the game. You took the hint, and started playing. Running and sprinting away from her as she giggled above. She found this very and was so excited to play with you like that. Raising her foot, she brought it right down and stomped it behind you, playfully laughing as she saw you narrowly dodge it. If she got you under her first foot fall, it would of been funny.

You dodged and kept moving as you remember the rules. You can’t hide under anything like her bed, and you don’t have any winning condition. So you were just playing to put a smile on her face, which funnily enough you were okay with.

You move and run dodging her foot as it planted next to your left.

“Oh, almost got you that time! Keep running little guy! I’m going to get you!” She said with a laugh and giggle. Chasing you around.

She planted her feet several time and you dodged every single one. You did have it on easy at the moment. Due to her not wanting to step onto you hard, she had slow steps and you had plenty of time to dodge and avoid.
 Doesn’t change the fact that you were starting to feel tired and a bit weary. You have been running for so long, and Eevee was still fine. In fact she seemed to love seeing you scurry around beneath her feet.

She did this for so long, until finally she caught you!

It was a plan of hers, as she stomped down in front of you, causing you to turn and run the other way.

You were going left, however her other foot stomped your way giving you little time to react.

You change course and started running away. sprinting between your legs as it was the closest option you really had.

She smiled as she suddenly dropped off her feet. She dropped down onto her rear as you see the whole body of the girl collapsing. It was like a cave in, and you could do nothing about it.

She came right down and landed on her rear, quickly she perked up and looked around to see if you were still running or if you got caught.

Eventually she felt you, moving and wiggling under one of her thighs. She grew a smile about it as she looked at you. Your whole body trapped under, except of your arms and your head.

“I got you! I got you! I win the game!” She cheered, raising her hands up in victory. It was an adorable sight, and you still talked.

“Yeah you won, you got me. Although not with your foot.” You say as she giggles.

“Well, this also counts.” She said with a shrug. She waited and left you there for a while. She just smiled down to you as you felt her furry thigh onto you. It was weird, as it felt like you were under a carpet.

Speaking up about it you question. “So... are you gonna lift it off of me?”

“Why don’t you try to do it by yourself.” She said as you can tell the playful look on her smile. “See if you are strong enough!”

“You and I both know I am not, but... sure why not.” You say as you plan to entertain the kid, putting your hands onto the ground and trying to lift her amazing thigh off of you.

You could not though, in fact you couldn’t even move her sitting thigh. She was too powerful for you, as it was like you were trying to lift a building.

“Y-Yeah, I can’t.”

“Hehe, I know, I just wanted to see you do it.” She said as she moved around, getting up as she shifted back. You got up only for a second, until you could see her foot against you. Her sole in front of you as you were a bit concerned.

“i was thinking, I didn’t get the chance to really step on you, so... can I?” She questioned as you thought about it for a second.

Being under feet was not something you were really excited for. At the same time though, this girl was being too gracious and kind to resist.

“Fine, a soft step though. And I’m going to bed right after.”

“Got it! Oh!” She said showing her white canines in a smile. She moved her foot to you and before you could understand what was happening, she brought it to you.

Pressing into your face and pressing into your body. She caused you to fall onto your back as her foot then rested on you. Turning your head so you don’t get a face full of foot, it was not something you were expecting.

Eevee herself loved it, as she put her hands to her cheeks and held her breath. She has no way to hide how much she was enjoying it. To feel you under her foot.

She wanted to have you there as long as she can, but she was respectful enough not to do that. She was raised right... by Leafeon. None of her other sister’s really contributed correctly.

She lifted it off of you as you smiled. “Okay, you had your fun. Can I sleep now?”

“Yes, Of course!”
111111.title: 6: Fun Game With Eevee

1111111.content:
After Eevee moved her foot off of you, she reached down and picked you up. Holding you close to her chest as she moves around, laying on her bed.

On her stomach, she dropped you into the box, right onto the sock. She could of been a bit more softer with the landing, but you were too tired. You needed to sleep.

This whole day has been unbeilable, not bad just insane. You needed to rest. You don’t even care if it’s on a girl’s sock.


Closing your eyes and resting, you were about to sleep, until of course you hear Eevee above.

“So... did you enjoy your first day with me?” She was of course wanting yes.

Which is why you gave it to her. “Y-Yeah I did. Let me just sleep, today’s been a bit hectic for me.”

“G-Got it. Well goodnight I guess. When I go to sleep, i’ll try not to wake you little guy.”

“Thanks Eevee.” Was the last thing you said until you rested. Eevee watched over you for a little bit, until she decided to leave you be. Walking out of the room with little sound.

She couldn’t hide her smile, and you were all she could think about.

“You look happy today Eevee.” Her sister said, walking by her younger sister’s door. It was Umbreon. Of course Umbreon wasn’t wearing a smile back.

“Oh... well I guess it’s been a good day.

-

When Eevee came back later that night, planning to go to sleep herself. You went to sleep in the middle of the day for her, so she stayed up a couple more hours until Leafeon got her ready for bed. Eevee walked in rubbing her eyes. She’s already brushed and all she had to do was change and sleep. She came in and checked on you in the box, to see that you were sleeping still.

With a smile she changed her clothes into her pyjama’s, white and brown. This was a great day, and she got a new friend in you. It surely was not what she was expecting, but she was so happy about it.

She was also thinking about if she should show you to her other sisters. Some would be okay with you, some Eevee wants you nowhere near. Leafeon, Sylveon, Flareon and Umbreon is on the good list.

Vaporeon, Jolteon, Espeon and Glaceon is on the bad list.

Regardless she was going to decide later, as she climbed into her bed and got under the blanket. Resting her head on the pillow.

With that, she followed you to sleep.

-

You woke up about an hour before Eevee, and with nothing to do you’ve just been waiting in the box. It was not like you really had a way to escape, so you were waiting. You were planning on tackling this day much better than tomorrow. Sure, it’s your normal life (Normal would be the furthest way to describe today.) but it’s still a good one. Much better than what yesterday was like. So you wait with a smile on your face.

“Eevee, time to wake up.” You hear a door creak open and a voice say. One of her sisters and if you remembered the voice correctly, Leafeon. She seemed nice, you would be okay if Eevee showed you to her.

“Ehhhh.” She said as you hear her stirring. Leafeon gave a giggle and moved away, while you remained quiet until you were sure Leafeon was gone.

“Hey! Eevee! Down here!” You say to her as you could hear her whole mattress moving around crazily. Eevee got to the foot and looked down in the box, seeing you standing.

“Good morning!”

And with that, she was okay with being woken up. You were still there, and now happier!

She grew a smile as she reached her hand down. It was a bit startling as her fingers came and wrapped around you once again. Holding you as she lifted you to her smile.

“Good morning!” She swung her legs around and rested them on the floor. “Are you excited for today.”

“I am, been awake for an hour.”

“Really, well you should of woke me as well!” She said as you laugh at that.

“Couldn’t really leave the box, anyway. What’s planned for today? What do you do around here. Do you go to.... school or something?”

“Not really, I do have to read books every now and then, but most days I just spend having fun!” She said happily and with a cheer. “This time with you.”

It was good to know, and you were gonna go ahead and relax with her. She moved up and placed you onto the bed as she looked over herself.

“Let me change out of my PJ’s and then i’ll get you breakfast.”

“And a bath, i’m kind of sick of being dirty.” You say to her. You didn’t really jump into the water while you were in the boat. Fear of sharks and all of that. “As well as some new clothes?”

“Uh... I don’t think I can do that. My clothes are just too big for you.” She said as you understand. Clothes your size don’t come normally, and your suitcase would be bottom of the ocean at this point.

She got to change and you turned around, making sure not to see her changing form. As Eevee looked at her clothes, she was going to grab something casual but paused. She saw something at the back, and she was going to put it on for the first time.

You didn’t bother looking until she said she was finished. Once you did you turned around, and she was watching something you weren’t expecting.

It was a short white sundress. One that stopped at her knees and looked clean. Almost like it was never worn before. White with red polka dots. On her brown fur, it admittedly looked cute.

“How do I look?” She questioned you.
1111111.title: 7: The Next Day...

11111111.content:
Well, clearly she wants one answer, so you might as well give it to Eevee. Talking up to her you smile. “Well you look nice. Is it gonna be a hot day?”

“Uh... N-No.” she said with a bit of a hesitation. “I just feel like wearing it! My sister Glaceon got it for me way back when. I was not a big fan of it though, but i’m glad you like it!”

This is confusing you a bit. “Wait, so if you aren’t a fan then why are you wearing it?”

“Just because!” She whined, as you have to giggle about this. She reached down for you and grabbed you, holding you in her fingers.

“Hey Eevee, be careful please. Getting grab is a bit weird.” You say to her as she understood about it.

“O-Oh. Sorry about that, anyway do you want a bath, since you look a bit dirty?”

She gave you this, and you are wearing a smile about it. Enjoying about it as you tell her. “Sure! Let’s do it.”

She moved around and leaves her room. Peaking her head out one final time to make sure her sister wasn’t there. She quickly skates her way over to the bathroom. Walking in and placing you onto the sink.

“Hey, you can take a bath here. Let em fill up the water for you.” She said as she put in the plug, and started to work. You waited for it to fill up as you try to think about something else.

“There we go, it’s full!” She said turning back.

“Right, since I did it for you, can you turn around as well once I get naked?”

“R-Right!” She yelled, turning away and looking away. You wear a smile as you start to take off your clothes as well. You were naked in no time, and you move over into the water even faster. Going down and under as you swim. It was perfect, like a spring hot bath. In fact it might be spring. You swim back up as you wear a smile.

“Okay you can look!”

Eevee turned around, seeing you swimming in the middle as she loved it. “So cute.”

“Oh uh thanks.” You say to her nervously laughing. “You got it perfect! If i’m being honest I feel bad for you that you can’t get in here.”

“Who says I can’t!” She says, taking the challenge as she brings her hand down. Plunging it right into the water and next to you.

“Oh, pretty nice.” She says as you two just relax and chat for each other.

“So, what are we going to do after this? You got the plan ready?” You question her just wanting to know.

She doesn’t, but she was quick to come up with an idea.

“How about the both of us just laying on my bed. You can lay on my stomach!” She said, her towering form over you with a smile. It was a little intimidating, but it was Eevee so you don’t dwell on it. “Does that sound nice?”

“Most definitely!” You say to her as she smiled. “Oh, also I thought of a way I can wear clothes.”

“Really, can you tell me?” Eevee said as she seemed actually interested about it.

“Well, if you get me just a small fabric, not only can I tie it around my waist like a towel, but I can probably shape them into clothes, or at very I can guide you into doing it.”

“That would be great!” I can do that, I can do that right now if you want.”

“Wait a second Eevee!” You yelled, wanting her to stay. She did not though, as she left the room. Guess she was a fan of the idea, which was not good for you.

What were you going to do? More accurately what can you do. Not like you can get out of the place, so you were still taking a sink bath.

You move around and rest down into the water. Closing your eyes and just taking in the great water. Eevee was probably out looking for fabrics at this point.

You were planning on just laying down until one of them comes back.

Turns out, it was not going to be that simple.

As one of the sisters came in! You heard the door creak open slightly as you got alerted. You were gonna ask if it was Eevee, but you were gonna be careful.

“Which one of my siblings let the water rest in here. How annoying.”

It was not Eevee! You move around and rest down below, dropping your body under the water as you tried not to be found.

Your whole body crammed into a ball in the corner and your mouth under the water. Breathing through your nose, you watch as a giant girl came into the room.

She looked like Eevee, but had a skinnier body, pink fur and glasses on her face. Admittedly, the glasses were pretty nice.

Espeon herself, needs to wash her hands. she’s always been the experimental type, and that has grown into cooking. She finds the perfect mixtures, and Leafeon cooks them.

The sisters alway work together.

As she brought her fingers down, you stayed in the corner afraid. You don’t know anything about this sister, she could be dangerous. Hurtful even.

So you are gonna stay down and not move around, or at least that was your plan until the giant cat swung her hands around. Cleaning them into the water as you felt yourself fly around. You had to stay under the water, and with eyes wide open you sae the fingers around. Smashing into each other as she cleaned.

Panic arose in you as you turn and began to try and swim away. Not easy so you had to just avoid at the last second. Fighting your way out as she swings her hands around, almost hitting you next!
11111111.title: 8: Washing Her Hands.

111111111.content:
You could do nothing as you start getting closer and closer to the hand underwater. You have been hiding this entire time, but you are certain she would feel you as soon as you touch her hand.

Not to mention, you were also losing air. Losing air at this point as you wanted to swim up and get your breath. You were done for, for so many reasons.

“Espeon!!!” A new girl yelled, Eevee at the door and seeing her sister washing her hands. Her eyes wide open as she looked down quickly, trying to find where you are. “W-What are you doing!?”

“Washing my hands, cleaning off the spices and hey!!!” Espeon changed course when she felt her younger sister bump into her. Enough to send her stepping back several times. “What was that for!?”

This was Eevee’s chance as she moved her hands down under. Sticking them in and searching around for you. Eventually she felt something, and wasted no time pulling you out. Her fist closed around you. Which was perfect timing as Espeon came back.

“Hey what was that for!”

“Oh I uh...” She said, trying to find a reason to justify her actions to her older sister. She didn’t really find one, so she just ran. Turning quick and escaping.

It wasn’t the best thing, but with Espeon who seems to know when her sister’s are lying, well it was smart.

She ran down the house, until she got out of the house and hid under one of the windowsills.

She opened her hand, and looked down to you. “A-Are you okay?”

“Oh, I need fresh air!” You say to her as you take heavy breaths. The caring girl above you as she felt bad.

“I-I shouldn’t have left you alone, I’m so sorry! I feel like a big dummy!”

“Relax Eevee, now you know for next time.” You say to her as she was looking right at you.

“Y-You’re not mad?” She questioned as you laughed on the other side.

“Of course not, now you know. Simple as that.”

“Oh... you are the best!!!” She cheered, bringing you to her chest and pressing you against it. You felt it against you, and you had to admit, you didn’t think she was at that age.

They weren’t big, but at your size they were noticeable.

She pulled you back as she smiled. “So uh... what no-”

“Eevee?” A voice said as you got cut off. Acting quick she held you there, holding you against her chest for a very long time. Turning her head, she could see Jolteon at the door! She was at the door at the moment, a bottle of water in her hand and sweat covering her body.

“H-Hi Jolteon, c-come back from your jog!”

“Yeah,” She said wiping her hand, getting some sweat off. “Went twice the distance today, damn i’m good.” She said back with a smirk. “So what are you doing squirt.”

“D-Don’t call me that. I’m big now.” She said pouting her lip. Jolteon saw the chance and laughed.

“Sorry, but you’re still the smallest in the house squirt.” And to add insult to injury, she patted Eevee on the head. “How about you come for a jog with me next time. You can see just how unstoppable your big sis is!”

You peered through the fingers, seeing the egotistical girl that was her sister. Seriously she has too much sisters.

“I-I’m good.”

“Come on, it’s good for you!” Jolteon said not backing up. “Maybe you can get some sweat abs like mine.”

Jolteon showed this off, lifting her tight shirt and shocked her six pack. She seemed to have a real good athletic body.

“I-I’m good.” She repeated as Jolteon simply walked by her. A laugh as she left going back inside.

“Okay, you are gonna have to explain to me all your sisters.” You say to her as she understood that was the smart thing. She got up and moved back inside, making sure to get to her room quickly and this time, closing the door. “You gonna tell me?”


“Yeah,” She replied, coming down and placing you onto the bed. She got onto her knees in front and told you. “I have 8 sisters. Vaporeon is the oldest, the one down at the beach. She’s very confident.”

“Got it, next.” You say seeing how much sisters she had.

“The second one is Jolteon, she’s the one you just met.”

“With the abs, got it. Next.”

“Then there is Flareon, you haven’t met her yet. She’s nice, but a bit shy. I’ve made her jump several times. But she is nice!”

“Well, nice is what I like. Next!”

“Espeon’s next, she was the one who almost felt you in the bath.”

“Yeah I...” Wait, have you forgotten this entire time. You stop as you close your legs and cover yourself.

“Next is Umbreon,” She said just continuing. “She’s got black fur and-”

“Yellow highlights. Yeah I met her before, she almost spotted me remember.”

“Right, she’s got good ears so we need to be careful with her. Next is Leafeon,”

“The one with the garden, got it. Next.”

“Glaceon. She’s got blue fur and... well she got me this dress.”

“Oh, is she like the fashion sister or-”

“No she’s the... worrying sister.” Eevee said as you could actually see fear in her eyes. That is worrying.

“Then Sylveon. Watch out, she’s full of energy.”

“Very full if I were to tell.” You say to her with a smile. “Well they seem nice, now... can you get me some clothes, I think we left mine in the bathroom.”

“Um... here.” She said getting up and grabbing a tissue. Ripping it in half and handing it to you. It wasn’t the best, but it was better than nothing. You put on the tissue, wearing it like a towel around your waist.

Thank Eevee! Now what?”

“Hmm... how about...
111111111.title: 9: Saved By Eevee

1111111111.content:
... Hide And Seek!” She said down to you, as you were okay with that idea. It’s not the worse she could think of, and you might even have some fun with it.

So Logically, you agree. “Sure, let’s play. Let’s give me a win now though. As in... if you don’t catch me in a minute, I win.”

“Okay, but if I do, I win!” She said with a cheer. In her mind, not only does she have a good chance, but she will win.

Dropping you down onto the floor as she lets you move. With a smile she toyed with you, with her finger as she hit you around. Nothing too much, but just playful.

“Okay! I’ll give you a minute to run out, go! Go! Go!”

She said covering her eyes. You took this time and moved instantly. Not really thinking about where you could go as you just run.

It would seem under the bed is where you were going, as you could hide in many spots there. In your boat? No too obvious.

Well what other things does she have buried under. Old pair of shoes? No that would smell bad, really bad you imagine.

Looking around some more, you saw a giant cardboard box. Was that a board game? Well regardless you couldn’t actually make your way in so next thing.

Eventually you decided as you smiled, finding a small hat stowed under. You move around and get under it. Lifting it as you get there safely.

You relax, laying back as you peek under. You can just see her feet, but it was enough.

“Okay, i’m coming!” She said, as she then started. Moving around as she moves with speed, planning on getting you before she can expect She was fast, and totally trashing her room. She seemed to really want to find you.

Eventually she came down onto her knees. Looking under the bed as you lower the hat, making sure you won’t be seen. You were mentally keeping track of the time. About thirty seconds left.

You could hear her rustling as you knew it was only a matter of time until she looked at the hat. So you do the smart thing, you go and hug the inside.

Why, well cause when she picked up the hat you weren’t found.

You feel her large fingers move and spin the hat as she didn’t find you under the hat. Tossing you onto the floor which has very quickly gotten dirty.

“Man where are you, it’s got to be more then a minute at this point!” She whined, leaning her head back as she cried. “Fine! You win where are you!?”

Hearing this, it was your entry as you lift the hat. Stepping out and into the open behind her.

“Right here! I was in the hat!” You shout as she turned around. Stepping onto her feet and looking down to you. She was about to congratulate you for the game, but something else happened.

The door behind you opened, and your froze. Turning your neck, you could see yet another sister.

She had big hair, almost glam rock style size. Not brushed though, but very big. It was not one you knew, but the new red sister if you were to guess, was Flareon.

“E-Eevee! A-Are you okay!? I heard you shout and... I... care.” Flareon said, pushing her fingers together.

“I’m fine!” Eevee panicked. You had to give it to her, she tried to get her sister out, but something went wrong.

You got spotted, but not for what you are. The bigger sister’s eyes landing down onto you as she screamed.

“B-Bug!!!” It was loud, and ear wrenching for you. So you have been seen as a bug? You can’t decide if that was a good or bad thing. Well looking at Flareon, the giantess seemed to be more scared of you, as she backed up.

Freaking out with eyes open and a hand to her chest. Even though the door was open, she hit the wall frightened. Even if you were a bug, what could you do to her?

“Help!”

“Flareon it’s fine, it’s-

Suddenly, you could see another giant form get into the room. She was big and blue, with a long wavy skirt and a top that hugged her body. Both with frost colours. Not to mention she had heels, and sadly her eyes landed down onto you.

“Is that the bug? Do not worry Flareon, I will handle it.” This girl wasn’t afraid of bugs, and that was bad for you.

She raised her heel up to you, and you could see the polish on it. The polish on your soon to come demise.

She brought it down onto you and you narrowly dodged the giant step. Jumping between the heel and the toes as it was room for you to breath.

She almost just killed you there, and judging from the twists she was doing, you are fairly sure she thinks she got you.

Eevee, was shocked for words as she couldn’t believe her eyes. Did she just see you die?

“Do’t worry Flareon, I helped you, and now you owe me one.” Glaceon said with a powerful smirk, keeping tracks of the favours. “As for you Eevee... you are finally wearing the dress! It looks so cute on you!” She cheered, stepping her way forward and getting close to her sister.

Eevee’s eyes were on you! You were alive as she wore a smile, only to be talked to her by her sister. She can’t focus on her though? She needs to get you to safety, but now!

“I-I hope there are no more bugs?” Flareon said, shifting her gaze around the floor. Something that Eevee and you both noticed.

She needed you safe. Signalling you to get to safety, she waves her hand.

Waving it around you couldn’t believe it. She wants you to escape out the room.
1111111111.title: 10: Dangerous Sister Steps

11111111111.content:
You cant believe it, does she really want you to get out? It makes sense, considering two of her sisters are in the room and you are in danger of getting stepped on. You eventually decide to back up and leave the door. Worse comes worse you just hang out around the corner until her two sisters. She could see you turn and run away, but she couldn’t reveal it as Glaceon was in her face, talking to her.

As you ran out, you wait near the door at the side. Your back against the wall as you just have to wait for them to leave.

Also hopefully not get spotted by any of the other sisters. So you just listen in on the conversation as they talk.

“I’m so happy I got you that dress, for free as well. You know what I think, you owe me something for that.”

“D-Do I really?” Eevee said as that was not something she wanted. Outside you couldn’t believe it. Glaceon seems determined to get favours, what will she do with them? Can’t be good.

Eevee took the rest of her sister talking until it ended. You watch as Glaceon led Flareon out of the room. The red and blue sister’s talking.

“Follow me Flareon, you can pay me back with a foot rub.” Glaceon said with a smirk as her sister followed.

“Okay, but no pedicure this time please?”

“We will see how I feel.”

As they both walked down the hall and down the stairs you breathed a sigh of relief. You somehow survived that.

“Okay, you can come back i-”

“Not right now!” You say to her as you then shut your lips, seeing more sisters walking down the hall. You can’t move at the moment. First was Vaporeon, walking pass you and... well you didn’t get a good view of her before, so it was nice to get one now.

She walked like she was large and in charge, which makes sense given that she is the oldest. You just wait for a long while until she passes. She passes and you were about to move in.

Until Sylveon came out and you froze again. She was jumping playfully with a bag full of laundry. She walked into the laundry room as you take one last look. Before passing back in and stepping in. “Eevee, that was too much.” You say to her as she instantly grabbed you. Freaking you out for a second as you get pulled right up.

She brought you up and rubbed you against her cheek. “I was so scared when she brought her heel down! You made it though, you are such a versatile little guy. Nothing can stop you!”

“E-Eevee, that’s enough okay.” You say to her, a bit more serious. “You’ve got to tell the other sisters about me.”

“What!?” She said, hurting your ears for a second as she brought you ahead. “N-No I don’t have to! I can take care of you, my sister’s don’t need to know about you.”

When she said this, you can understand where she was coming from. She wants to be the mature one, as well as take care of you. Problem is, that won’t work at this point.

“You have too many sister’s Eevee. I’ve already met all of them, and I almost got stepped on at that point. So in other words, it’s too dangerous.”

“No, I just got to keep you in my room! I Just got to take care of you!” She moved over and lowered you down into the cardboard box that has been arranged to be your new room. “See, if you are in there, none of my sisters will even see you!”

“That may be true, for now. I just don’t want to run the risk of getting stepped on by another one of your sisters.” You say trying to reason her. You are smart enough to know that at her size, she is determining your fate and you have to convince her.

“You won’t, I promise.” Eevee said with a smile. “I will take care of you, and keep you safe.”

So that was it, you weren’t gonna convince this giant child you knew that. Well guess all you can hope for is the best.

“Well, at the very least can you close the door so you won’t be spotted talking to me?” You question as she perked up.

“That, is a good idea.”

She closed the door, and for the next while you two talked. Just talked and bonded. You told her about your life before you arrived at this place, while she talked you more about her sisters and told you about stories with them.

Listening to her, and using your prior info, you pieced together who you want to be near. and who you don’t.

One of the latter is. “So... she bought you that dress? Glaceon right?”

“Yeah... but I don’t usually wear it. She bought it for me for a favour.”

“She’s really into getting those, isn’t she?”

“And it’s never good! She makes sure to cash them in perfectly and even makes events happen so she gets them.” Eevee said as you can tell she needed to vent about this. “Last thing I did for her, I had to be her seat for a little while. She sat on my back while she did her nails!”

“Why don’t you just say no?” You question as that would be what you did in that situation. Well not with this size obviously.

“It’s not that simple. Do that, she usually tries to freeze you.” Eevee said casually, a little bit too casually.

“F-Freeze? What do you mean?”

“You know freeze, like a block of ice. It’s not good, Leafeon has scolded her on it, but she’s sneaky.” Eevee said casually, until she looked down to you and her eyes open. “Oh you don’t know! Well, we have powers.”
11111111111.title: 11: Too Many Sisters

111111111111.content:
You just stare at her for a couple of seconds, unable to really understand what she was talking about? Powers?”

“Yeah powers. All my sisters have them. Types is what they are actually called. Vaporeon is a water type, Flareon is fire type, Jolteon is an electric type.”

“And you are saying that those girls, have powers? What can Jolteon shoot lightning from her fingers?” You question as she nodded.

“Yeah, you get it!”

“Then.. what type are you?” You question with the most confused face about this

“Oh i’m normal type?” She said with a smile, as you guess she had an answer for that.

“And what does that mean? What is your power?” You question just wanting to know.

“I uh... don’t know yet. My sisters usually got theirs around my age, all through different means. I just got to wait for mine.” There was an air of silence until you just had to comment.

“I don’t believe you.”

“W-What?”

“I don’t believe you, not for a second. Your trying to mess with me.” You said with a knowing smirk. “You can’t get me that easy.”

“It’s true! Everything I said is true.” She said bringing her fist down in a bit of a tantrum. You didn’t show fear as you smirked.

“Nice try, you won’t get me that easy.”

“Whatever it’s true.” She said pouting just like a child would. “Let’s do something.”

In your mind, she just wants to get past, about the fact she was caught out. So you do just that. “Sure, another game?”

Her expression changes and she gets happy. “Yes! Okay i’ve got a good one in my mind, you might need to be convinced about it.”

When she said that, your eagerness admittedly dropped as you look at her. “Well that’s not a good sign. What is it?”

“Well, This is gonna be fun. I want you... wait for it. I want you, to climb my body!!!”

She cheered about this, almost like she expected fireworks after she said it. You were left confused about it. Your eyes having to look over the girl as you debate if you should do this.

She clearly wants you to, but it also sounds like a lot of trouble, and you don’t know if you can do it.

You eventually decide that you might as well. “fine, but you got to get your hands ready just in case I fall. And you must be on the bed, so I would at least bounce!”

“Yes! Of course yes!” She cheered happily. Scooping you up and putting you into the middle of her bed. Of course her blanket not made up as you were on the mattress..

The bed then shook as she lifted her foot onto the bed and stepped in front of you. Towering over you once again as you saw her towering frame.

Her toes wiggling in front of you as she looked down playfully. You don’t think she thought this entirely the way through, because you were able to see under her dress. Seeing something you should not be. You were not going to bring it up of course, cause you know better.

“So, ready for me to start?” You question her as she giggled. She gave you an answer as she brought her toe and tapped your chest with it. It was a small tap, but it was enough to send you falling back onto your rear.

“Yep, let’s start!” She said happily as you do what she wants. Stepping onto your feet and getting up. You prepare to move over and jump onto the toe that had just knocked you down.

You get up onto it as you step onto the nail, it was a bit weird, looking up at the tower you were about to climb.

While hard, not impossible. She had fur all over her body, and you were going to use that brown fur to scale up her legs. Taking steps onto it, you move over and walk your way through. Until finally you reach the heel area.

You make your way and climb up, hands on the fur as you lift yourself up. Lifting yourself up as you proceeded to go Eevee climbing.

She giggled, moving her body as she felt your small efforts on her leg.

“H-Hey! Be careful okay!” You shout to her. You don’t know if she realises but her smallest action was enough to cause danger for you. You reached her ankle as you keep climbing. Basically nothing stopping you as you go up and up. The bed became further from you, and you were glad it was going to be soft if you fall. Hoping that the bounce would soften your drop.

She felt you onto her knee as she insticevly kicked it, just a little bit, but enough to make you almost let go. One of your hands go loose, but one grabs. “Careful Eevee.”

“I’m trying, your just so ticklish. I love this!” She said with a voice of pure joy.

“Yeah, I imagine so.” You say as you move above her knee and finally to her thigh. Getting up more and more. Eevee’s head leaning forward as she was trying to spot you. She was trying to not only spot you, but keep her eyes on you. You get up there, until finally you had to ask.

“Hey Eevee? Do you think you can push your dress to me?”

“What, why?” She questioned, until the child pieced it together. If you were climbing the way you were, you would go into her dress. Not only that, but into her privates. “S-Sure!” She said with a little blush. Pushing it closer to you as you thank her.

Moving your hands there, you grab on and she lets go. The dress freely swaying back and forth. While she was doing this, you moved up and got your way up. Climbing the outside now for the road now.
111111111111.title: 12: Eevee's Lower Half

1111111111111.content:
currently, you were moving up the outside of the dress, making sure you would go up and up. You can see her excited smile gleam down onto you, as you were really glad about it. She was nice, and amazing.

You move up and up until finally you were at her stomach. “Hey Eevee?” You question playfully as she giggles. “Are you ticklish on your stomach?”

“N-No!” She said with a bit of a hesitant situation. Making you smile as you already know.

“Oh you so are! How would you feel if I tickled your stomach? You would burst out laughing.”

“Yeah, well are you ticklish!?” She said, fighting back as you were left thinking about it for a little while.

“No.” Yours was more sudden, and she was able to understand it.

“Oh you are too! If you tickle me, i’ll give you an even bigger tickle! So watch it!”

“Right, right.” You say back to her, rolling your eyes. You move around and get up, until you were basically on her chest. You don’t want to focus on it, not one bit. So you keep moving up and up as you scale her chest. It was a slight hill, but thankfully only a slight.

“Hehe, if I have a pocket, you could stay in there all day.” She said, just thinking about that as you were a bit shocked, but still nodded.

“That sounds like a good idea.” You say as you just keep moving. Ignoring what you were on as you get to the top of her opening. Standing there and smiling, even turning around and looking down. It would be quite the fall for you, and that was not something you were okay with. You were gonna have to get closer.

You move up and get closer up, as you grab the fur from her neck.

“Eevee, hopefully this doesn’t feel too weird.” You say to her, feeling like you need to clarify this. You move up more and more as she started to feel a bit wrong.

Biting her lips and not looking happy. Until finally she couldn’t take it anymore. None at all as she told him. “Get off!!”

She moved her finger around and knocked you off. You felt yourself go loose and go down. Screaming as you fall the way down.

“Ahhh!!” All your screaming and flailing did nothing as Eevee perked up. She tried to catch you as you were dropping down her dress. She moved her two hands together and closed planning catching you, but instead missed.

You were feeling yourself falling as you were bracing for impact. You are about to explode on contact, and this was the end of you.

You hit the ground, stopping your entire momentum as you hit the bed. Only to then bounce back up, like you were on a trampoline.

Your back hurting due to the heavy hit, but not enough to cause you pain, in fact... not enough as it should.

Eevee looked down afraid of what would happen to you, however her gaze changed as she saw you bounce. She got more excited, and totally relieved. “Amazing! You are okay!” She said coming down. You were already bouncing, so when she got down, you started to bounce even more. Going up and down without control as you look at the girl’s knees, which was right in front of you.

“Yeah, What was that!?”

“I’m so sorry! I felt you on my neck, and you felt all weird grabbing that, I-I didn’t mean to actually drop you! I’m so sorry, come here!”

She grabbed you before you could actually do anything, as she pulled you up and brought you right to her chest. She brought you right there and pressed you against. Crossing both of her furry hands over you as she gave you the biggest hug you have ever felt.

“I’m serious, I am so sorry.” She said as you guess it was okay.

“I-It’s fine, just be careful. It’s my life you almost ended there.”

“I know!” She said bringing you back and smiling. “I promise next time, I will be more careful for you. A lot more careful.”

“I think needless to say, I don’t feel like climbing anymore.” You say to her, a bit of a chuckle as you are not in the mood.

“And you don’t have to, cause you have won!”

You were confused what Eevee said, but felt yourself moved onto the top of her head. Right onto her hair.

Hair, not fur just to clarify.

“See, you won!” She said happily as you had to admit, it was really a nice gesture of hers. Guess she figured out that she made a mistake by hitting you off and wanted to let you win.

“Now for your reward!” Eevee said bringing you down, right in front of her face. She was smiling, but an ease of nervousness was on her face. She let you sit there, staring right at her face as you were confused about what she was going to do next. Suddenly she brought you forward!

Bringing you close as you saw something you didn’t think you would ever see. She puckered her lips. Puckering it as it drew closer and closer.

Finally, it hit you. Her two lips pushing down onto you, as this was one of the few parts of her body that was not covered on fur. She kissed you only for a second, before she then pulled you by. She saw you sitting on her hand, seeing that you were left stunned.

“Wow, Vaporeon always said a kiss would stun a boy, but I’ve never done one before. Guess you are my first.”

She giggled at this, while you were left stunned. That was by far the biggest kiss you have ever seen. Literally the biggest.

You two quickly moved pass this, as you two talk a while in the bed.

Until later that night’s event.
1111111111111.title: 13: Eevee;s Upper Half

11111111111111.content:
It was a long while as you two just stayed in the room. She seemed really adamant about keeping you in there, and that was nice. She even let you... do your business in your box. It was a bit disgusting, but you manage to convince her to get some toilet paper and quickly discard it after you were finished.

You two just talked, until there was a knock on the door. Eevee reacted quick, moving her hand around and covering you. Just in case someone was going to come in.

No one did though, instead Leafeon yelled from the other side.

“Eevee dear, come down, dinner is ready! We are having homegrown salad!”

“We are!!” She said, pretty much leaping. “Oh, i’ll be right down!”

She uncovered you and proceeded to get up, moving onto her feet. She proceeded to run ahead and get some food, when she heard your voice behind.

“Hey, can you get me some!”

“Oh I’m going to. You are gonna love her salad. She gets it from her garden, and throws dressing on it. You are going to love it!” And with that, she started to leave. You were by yourself on the bed, just slapping your knees a couple of times.

Just got to wait for her to come back.

-

Eevee moved down and joined the rest of her sisters at the table. They always ate together, with four on one side, four on the other and Eevee at the head.

A lot of conversation and a lot of eating. Eevee grabbed her plate.

“What do you say?” Leafeon questioned at her side.

“Thank you for the meal!”

They all started to eat, some of them talking to each other but Eevee didn’t listen. She had her mind on the food that she loved, as well as you back in your place. She needed to sneak you some. Now logically, someone would sneak some of the food they currently have.

That was not what they did, cause instead, she wanted more. “Leafeon, can I have some more.”

“Now you know the rules Eevee, only one for everyone. I made it just enough for a meal each.” She said as she looked to Jolteon, knowing what other girl would break it in literally an instant.

“But it’s not for me, it’s for...” Eevee trailed off, becoming more quiet about it as she hoped none of her sisters have been listening. That would not be good, she almost just revealed your existence.

“For who?” Leafeon questioned as Eevee thought about this.

“Okay, it is for me!” She said, quickly defending herself. “Can I please have it. I’ll do anything!”

“Fine, on one condition though, tomorrow, you have to help me in the garden.” Leafeon said with the kindest smile.
 She was really happy about it, and brought her fingers forward. She reached forward and scooped some more on her plate. Getting up she then turned. “I’m going to be eating the rest in my room okay. Bye!” Eevee said, thinking she could not have done it better.
 She left the room and walked right up with her food. Going to her room to share with you.

While all her sisters, could not help but look at her a bit confused. Sure, she didn’t love eating with all her sister, but what else would she do.

“What was that about? Squirt’s acting weirder than usual.” Jolteon said simply eating.

“What do you mean weirder?” Sylveon questioned, not knowing.

“Well that for starters.”

“She had a bug in her room that I stepped on,” Glaceon added. “When I killed it, she seemed almost, heartbroken in a way.”

“She wanted to go to the beach, then moved on almost as soon as we got there.” Vaporeon added.

“I heard a boy’s voice in her room.” Umbreon added, this one being the most intriguing as all the girls looked at her.

“And you are just now, sharing that!?” Jolteon said with a laugh.

“Explains the dress, my theory. Is that our little sister has found a boy down at the beach, promised to sneak him into her room, and is now sheltering him in there. Hence is why she is bringing spare food up there, as well as wanting to look good with the dress.” Espeon said as she quickly pieced it together.”

“Doesn’t explain the bug poindexter.” Jolteon mocked as Espeon rolled her eyes.

“She’s our little sister, of course she doesn’t want to see an insect dying.”

“Oh, she has a boyfriend!” Vaporeon said with the biggest smile. “I’ve got to see this, i’m going?”

“Hang on a minute,” Leafeon said. “We can’t just... barge our way into her room. This is her life, and as protective as I feel, we should let her make her choice.”

“We could, or we could hang this over her and tease her nonstop.” Glaceon countered.

“I vote for that one.” Vaporeon replied with a smile that was just as big.


As the two blue sister’s started to get up. They got stopped by the only sister that hasn’t spoken up about it.

“Uh... I might have something to add?”

“What?”


“Well... when I saw the bug, I saw that it was... not, looking like a bug?” Flareon said, her gaze looking around. “Is that weird.”

“Now i’m interested.” Espeon added, wanting to inspect this bug, or at least others like it.

“As am I. I am passionate about going.” Umbreon said as her expression did not change.

“Oh, let’s see what she’s up to. Maybe she has a whole bug farm!” Sylveon said, the excited girl excited as usual.

“Wonder if I can stomp on some?” Jolteon laughed. This lasted for a long while as all the girls were on board, except Leafeon.

However, she could do nothing as they all get up and walk up to their sister’s room. She joined of course, It’s like a giant parade going to her room.

As you were about to be seen
11111111111111.title: 14: Sister's Getting Curious

111111111111111.content:
All of the girls made their way in, keeping quiet making sure not to alert their youngest sister of the stampede they were going to get. Jolteon and Vaporeon of course leading the pack. Both of them with teasing smirks on their faces.

Whatever Eevee was hiding, she can expect a lot of sisterly teasing and attacking.

Jolteon put her hand on the door and raised her fingers,

3, 2, 1.

Jolteon pushed with all her might the door. Pushing it open. Well more slammed it open, as it hit the wall with her strength.

“Hey Eevee! What’s going on!” She said, as fast as she can so she can startle her sister. It really did, as Eevee was on the bed and screamed. Leaping onto her feet and screaming at the top of her lungs.
 She brought herself back down though, very quickly. Little did her sister realise, not in the same spot.

“J-Jolteon, don’t do that!” Eevee said, her legs closed and her fingers on her lap.

Jolteon ignored her little sister’s pleas, and just kept walking. Looking around the room as the rest of her sisters piled in. “Okay Eevee, where is it!?”

“W-Where is what?”

“Whatever you are hiding,” Jolteon replied. “Just tell me!”

“What’s this about?”

“We have figured out you are hiding something, we are here to investigate.” Espeon said, as she didn’t need an invitation, she just started to look around.

“H-Hey, i’m not hiding anything!” She said, as her eyes shifted to something that luckily none of her sisters have seen.

“A bug farm?” Glaceon said. “Which is pretty much why you freaked out when I stepped on one.”

“N-No. I just don’t like you stepping on something.” She replied as she was hoping they would leave, like right this minute.

“Okay, well did you find a boy down at the beach and bring him in?” Umbreon said, as that was the one she was going for.

“No!” She said quickly, a bit too much. Something that Vaporeon caught on.

“Oh you did! You so did! Where is the young strapping lad, is he hiding under the bed?” She said, getting uncomfortably close to her sister, her boobs hanging in her face.

“I didn’t!”

“Then why... did you bring the salad to your room?” Flareon questioned.

“Because I was hungry!!”

“And what is this then?” Sylveon added, lifting something at the foot of the bed. It was the cardboard box and looking at it Eevee tried to fake it.

“I... don’t know what that is.” She said, as none of her sisters bought it. Clearly she was hiding something, and the sisters were not going to leave until they could know.

Leafeon understood, so she stepped her way forward. Crouching down to talk to the youngest sister.

“Eevee, I just want to know, are you hiding something? We aren’t mad, we just want to know. Our family has never kept secrets, and I don’t want us to start now. Please tell us, it would mean a lot.”

Eevee looked at her only responsible sister and was struggling to get the words out. Should she tell her, or should she not?

Leafeon could see she was on the air of telling her. So the leaf girl looked around among all the other sisters. “Girls, please give her some air to breath.”

“Air... to... Breath.” Eevee said simply, when suddenly her face turned to horror. “He needs air to breath!”

She sprung up into the air, causing Leafeon to take several steps back in surprise. Her little sister turned around and got down onto her knees. “No, he’s out of it! Please don’t be dead! Please don’t be dead!”

While her sister’s on the other side all approached the bed, looking over Eevee’s shoulders.

“The salad is there?”

“I think I see something else!”

“The bug... it’s the bug I stepped on.”

“I... Is it dead?”

“Why was Eevee sitting on it?

“A bug under her butt?”

“Weird thing to hide?”

“Eevee, you mind explaining?”

-

When you woke up, you feel your body aching a bit. It was so good, and you were enjoying the salad that Eevee snuck into. When suddenly before you could understand, Eevee moved and sat down onto you. Her heavy weight on you as you were unable to lift her. You even ran out of your breath and passed out.

“Eevee?” You question trying to grip your head. “Why did you sit on me? And why... can’t I move my arms?”

“Hehe, guess he does talk.” A voice said as your eyes shot open, seeing a giant eye in your path! Surrounding by yellow fur.

She pulled her face back and chuckled with a smirk. Seeing your small and weak power. You jerk around, freaking out as you were in a giant room, dangled in the air!

She moved her finger and pushed it onto your front, sending you for a swing as she laughed.

“Jolteon!” Eevee said, sitting on the couch in the back, Glaceon at her side. “Don’t pick on him!”

“Hehe, guess you aren’t the squirt in the house anymore Eevee.” She said as she did take a step back.

You have no idea how this happened, but all the girls are looking at you! All the girls know about you. While your eyes dart around crazily among all the girls, one of them walked forward.

Vaporeon, and you could see her giant chest right in front of you. It was right where you were getting dangled.

“Hello, my little boy.” She said straightening her back and pushing out her chest. You try not to focus on it and shift your gaze, but Vaporeon could see the red blushing face.

Learning what she wanted.

“W-why am I tied up?” You say as you were dangling by a string from the ceiling, wrapped around your body.

“It’s for Flareon, this is to make her feel comfortable. Now girls, lets talk about him.”
111111111111111.title: 15: The Sister's Have Found You

1111111111111111.content:
As you dangle in front of all the girls, you could not help but feel worried. These girls found you under their sister’s rear, you hope they don’t do anything bad to you or think you less for what.

 “N-Now wait a second!” You shout to them, all giant girls having their eyes on you. A bit intimidating, but still you continued. “I-I didn’t want to be under there! Eevee just wanted to hide me and-”

“Relax squirt. She already told us she was trying to hide you.” Jolteon said as this actually did calm you down.

“Now we are just trying to decide what to do with you.” Leafeon said as your eyes went open.

“Listen, Eevee just found me in the ocean and she took me here. She’s been kind enough to house me and... well i’ve taken it. I haven’t done anything bad I swear.”
