“Technically you violated both trespassing and squatting.” Espeon added as you can’t really argue that.

“M-Maybe. You got to see though I have no other option! I-I’m not really sure. but I come from a land far across the ocean. I was part of a shipwreck and got here.”

“A shipwreck?” Umbreon added, showing some intrigue. Of course you didn’t pick up on it. “And you escaped.”

“That’s right, I was stranded in the ocean until Eevee found me.”

“Then I brought him in, took care of him, had fun with him and made him safe!” Eevee yelled, seeming like she wanted to say that for a long time. “I can look after him!”

“Eevee, your too young to look after something.” Vaporeon said as she then fluttered her eyes to you. “Especially one so... handsome.”

There was an air of pause after this, as all her sisters knew what was going to happen. That is, if you are staying.

“So... what are we going to do to him?” Flareon questioned.

“Well I say we keep him!” Sylveon said, moving her face right close. “I wanna play with him, and he can play with me! Hey, do you wanna keep me?”

You were left thinking. “S-Sure.”

“Then you’re staying!”

“We need to all pick that Sylveon.” Leafeon said as her sister giggled, the ice one smiling.

“Please, like any of us don’t want him here.” Glaceon said, smirking at you in a way that made you feel a bit uneasy. “Also, fairly sure he would want to stay here.”

You pause for a long while as you just had to ask. “A-Am I allowed to stay?” You say, knowing that was the question you had to ask. “Please, I have no other place to go. Not really sure about most things.”

“He’s got to stay! He’s just got to!” Eevee said stepping onto her feet. She moved around and stood next to you. “You girls always taught me that if someone needs help, we help them. He needs my help right now? So we can’t kick him out!”

“Eevee,”

“No, I want him here, and... if you kick him out, y-you are gonna have to kick me out too!!”

She shouted this for a long time as all her sisters looked at her.

“Okay girls, who wants to keep him!?” Vaporeon said, knowing this will be able to ease Eevee. “I for one, want to keep him. I think it would be nice, having a little boy here.”

“I want the squirt here, the fun I can have with him.” Jolteon added.

“W-Well, I guess it would be rude to kick him out.” Flareon said moving her hair in front of her face.

“I wouldn’t dare to pass this study.” Said Espeon, who admittedly scared you.

“Yes.” Umbreon said simply.

“If Eevee wants him here, I will support her choice.” Leafeon admitted.

“He can stay, in exchange... for a favour.” Glaceon smirked, which worried you cause of course it did.

“Yes! It’s of course a yes!!” Sylveon jumped around.

After a while you smiled, as you had to do it. “Thank you! Thank you so much, I owe you all everything!”

They all smiled to you, as you were so glad. Not as glad as Eevee seemed, as she brought you around and pushed you her chest. Hugging you.

“You’re staying! You’re staying!!” She was so happy about this as she let you go, letting you swing around and unable to do anything. She moved her fingers around to the top and tried to untie the rope, but that was the mistake.

Cause as you saw her doing this, another sister came. A big blue fur hand coming and grabbing you!

She grabbed you and pulled you up to her face, letting you see the seductive look she was giving you.

It was Vaporeon.

“Well, I suppose as the oldest sister, i’ll look after him. He can stay in my room.”

“No! He was in my room!” Eevee said up to her sister and stomping her foot.

“Now now, i’m sure he would love to sleep with a woman, rather than a girl.” Vaporeon teased, as she taunted her sister. Even moving her finger around and covering your mouth. You could not talk to her because the blue finger was in your mouth.

“Give him here! Give him here!” She yelled and complained

“Vaporeon give him back to her.” Espeon said. “I will create a chart and divide his time among us evenly.”

“Boring!” Jolteon added. “Let’s just say first comes first serves.”

“How about... if one sister has him, you can’t grab him yourself! Sounds fair right?” Sylveon said as the girls had to agree.

You would complain you weren’t a toy, but your mouth was being covered and... well this was the life you chose.

“And since I have him right now, you girls can’t take him from me.”

“That’s not fair!” Eevee said up to her sister. “Leafeon!”

“Girls. Stop fighting! I’ll take him for tonight and we can decide later.”
1111111111111111.title: 16: Will The Girls Keep You?

11111111111111111.content:
“Eevee,” You address her talking to her. “I would feel really safe with Leafeon. I can see you in the morning.”

“What?”

“I’ll take good care of him, I promise.” Leafeon said walking up. “And then we can figure something out. I promise.”

If it was any other sister, there was no chance she would agree to this, however because it is Leafeon. “Sure.”

Leafeon smiled and walked to her oldest sister, holding her hand out in front of Vaporeon. The girl sighed and handed you over, placing you in the other hand.

“Fine, but he will have so much less fun.” She said before giving you a wink. A wink that sent a shudder down your spine. Leafeon started to untie you completely as she turned.

“Well, i’m going to sleep then, Eevee... can I have the cardboard box home?” She questioned as Eevee nodded. That didn’t come up with the conversation, you guess they were talking about you when you were out.

Holding the box, she headed to sleep. Eevee looking at you a bit sad. She wasn’t going to be the only one looking after you.

-

As Leafeon stepped into the room, you looked around. Green walls, green furniture and a lot of dirt on the ground. Not enough that it’s covered, but enough that it’s noticeable. She locked the door, telling you. “I have no doubt in my mind, one of my sisters will try to take you when I sleep. Let’s prevent that.”

She headed over and placed you onto the dresser, making you trip a bit. “Apologies.”

“T-That’s fine.” You say back to her sending a smile. “Sorry about this, -”

“No need to apologise yourself.” She said cutting you off. “You need help, and Eevee was willing to help you. I’m very proud of my sister, seems like she did the right thing. Granted she should of revealed you to us as soon as she could, but i’m still very proud. She seems to have taken a liking to you.”

“Yeah I guess she has.” You say back to her as you then think. “Your sisters seem to have as well.”

“Don’t worry, they might be playful and mischievous, none of them would actually be willing to hurt you.” She said, now do you want me to set up a bed for you.

“Oh I have one, I lay on Eevee’s sock and... yeah can you see if you can get me a better one?” You say changing it as she giggled.

She moved ahead and looked around, trying to find something for you. When she came back, it was with tissues. One balled up and one flat out.

“You can sleep on these, i’ll prepare a bed in your box.”

“Thank you!” You say back to her. “What are you, the nice sister.”

“Well, I wouldn’t say that, i’m just very understanding. Looking after all of them and all.”

You wouldn’t argue.

“Here, let me show you your new bed.” She said lowering her hand down. She wasn’t grabbing you, she was letting you step onto it. That was very nice of her.
 You step onto her fur and she raises you up, letting you see over the walls of your home. She has arranged them perfectly into a bed. Mattress, pillow, blanket. That was just too nice of her.

“Wow, thanks Leafeon! I’m gonna have a good sleep tonight.”

“Don’t worry about it (Your Name).” She said simply.

“I... I don’t think I told you my name?”

“Eevee did.” Leafeon said simply as she gave you an answer. Now, stay in there while I change myself.” She dropped you onto the cardboard as she left. You simply wait for her to come back, as you had nothing else to do. When she did, she had a green night top on as well as long baggy pants. Her hair down and looking like she was ready to sleep.

“I’m an early riser, so I might wake up.”

“That’s fine, so am I” You say back to her. “In fact, I woke up before Eevee.”

“I imagine it wasn’t fun waiting for her,” Leafeon giggled. “Don’t worry, you won’t have that problem with me.”

“Why do you wake up so early?” You question as she smiled.

“Well, it’s prepare and water my garden. I’m... a bit of a green head, as Jolteon would call me.”

“Really, I mean I get wanting to have a garden, but an early morning for it?”

“It’s... a big garden.” She said as you could imagine. “Maybe, you would like to accompany me in the morning. It would be nice to have someone to talk to.”

“Sure i’d love that.” You say back to her as the date was made. You were glad you were spending time with Leafeon first, as it seems she is the most level headed and nurturing of all the sisters. “So, we going to sleep?”

“Well, i’m very tired and it’s an early morning for me. Let me just tuck you in.”

“T-Tuck me in?” You question as you were a little bit shocked at her words. she simply just smiled and moved her fingers in, pulling the blanket back.

“Don’t worry, I did it to Eevee all the time when she was little. Just get in.”

“Sure?” You say to her sitting onto the bed moving your win. You rest your head against the makeshift pillow and lay, her smile over you. She put the blanket onto you and made sure you were properly in. “Don’t you find this a bit weird.”

“Actually a bit refreshing, Eevee doesn’t let me do it anymore, and it is something i’ve missed.” She said as you guess you can’t argue that. She patted the bed several times as she brought her finger to your cheek. “Goodnight, I will see you in the morning.”

“O-Okay, see you then.” You say as she did everything shy of a goodbye kiss.

Leafeon left, going to bed.
11111111111111111.title: 17: The Nurturing Sister

111111111111111111.content:
It didn’t take you long to actually fall asleep, as the bed was set up for you. Same could be said for waking up, cause as the daylight hit, you woke up.

Or more specifically, Leafeon woke you up. She was going with her morning routine of watering her garden, making sure all of it got the sun during the day. She quickly got changed into a light green sweater and soft pants. Mostly to make sure she won’t freeze while she waters.

However, she quickly got reminded of you, walking over and seeing you still sleeping. She brought her finger around and poked it down at you gently.

“great, so you agreed. Next time we are going for a jog.” Jolteon said as that was something you cared about.

“W-Wait a second, please.” You say finally as she rolls her eyes.

“Come on, that’s until tomorrow. Let’s just rest until next time.” With that, she finally moved down and went into the house. She walked right in, as she then brought you down near her giant yellow foot.

“Welp, gonna let you just walk around and go.” She said simply, letting you rest. You see her giant towering body walk away as you were by yourself.

What are you gonna do about this? Well, you were by yourself and you might as well go exploring. Near the outside room, you walk around and look out. Seeing the giant place. The backdoor was connected to a small laundry room, which connects to the kitchen. No one was there, so you did take the time looking around. They mostly had fruit, but you could see some other foods you are pretty sure Leafeon didn’t grow.

Walking into the next room, it was the living room. They had a lot of chairs, with two sets of couches. You could understand why, considering how many sisters.

Resting on a couch, man you could use that right now. That was the plan, but you stop when you see Flareon.
11111111111111111111111.title: 23: Jolteon Continues Her Fun

111111111111111111111111.content:
Flareon was sitting on the couch and reading a book. You could tell the girl hasn’t seen you yet, which did interest you.

You could move along and explore the rest of the house, or you can go ahead and talk to this girl. She seems a bit more shy about you then the other girls, and if you are going to be living with them, you might as well try to break down this barrier that was between you and her.

you approach her on the couch, standing near her foot as you looked up. Legs closed, with a tight white skirt over her body, a white sweater neck and more hair then the rest of her sisters. It was so big and had so much volume.

“Hello.” You say, trying not to spook her. It didn’t work.

“Eeepp!!” She freaked out, jumping her body into the air. The book dropping down on her lap and her feet raising up onto the couch. Cradled in a ball, you can’t believe you just scared this giant girl. Given your size at least.

Flareon looked around until finally her eyes landed on you down below. Just standing by her and watching. Almost by instinct, she moved her fingers around and covered part of her face with her hair.

“Hey there Flareon, what were you reading?” You question, only to not get an answer. She just stayed at you and remained silent. You gave her time, but you guess she still wasn’t okay with you.

You could walk away, but you were going to try and stay. “Okay... so mind if I get up there with you? I need a rest at this point.” While you said this, you were expecting an answer back, but she didn’t give one. In fact all she did was stare at you, like a deer caught in headlights. You slap your knee several times before giving up.

“Okay, that’s fine i’ll just sit down here.” You say to her as you onto your rear on the carpet. Crossing your legs. “My size, it’s not like I could properly rest on the couch hehe.”

She still looked. This was getting more and more awkward as we go.

“So...” You say as you were starting to run out of questions. “Flareon, how are you? How has your day been? Anything planned?”

They were general questions, a bit inclusive but you just had to strike up a conversation. She did not take the bet though.

“W-Well mine have been a mixed bag so far. Waking up with Leafeon was nice, we even went out to her garden. Then Sylveon had me and... well let’s just say she was playful. You can imagine can’t you.” You say laughing and trying to talk about something the both of you can relate to. She didn’t have an interest though. Or she was just too scared to actually talk to you.

“Then Jolteon had me and oh boy, that was tough. That sister of yours is even more playful, and not in a good way.” You say waiting for a reaction. She didn’t give one, just the same watching face.

You aren’t getting anywhere, so you start to give up. With a sigh of disappointment, you turn around away from the girl. “Well uh... i’m just going to go now. Bye Flareon have a good day.”

As you were walking away, feeling like you didn’t get any closer to the girl, she did say something that raised your interest/

“What did she do?” She questioned. It was light, and even you had trouble hearing her. However this was your ticket in and you were gonna take it. Turning your body back to her, you see her eyes once again. Slightly changed.

“Oh well... she took me outside and forced me to lift her finger, putting down more and more pressure on it.” You say as you see her listening, but she was not responding. Once you realise that this was not going to be a conversation, you continued talking to her. “Then she did her own sit ups, and made me grab onto her abs as she moved. of course I feel down off her body onto the ground. She lifted me up, then forced me to do pull ups with her finger. Your sister is very intense, i’m also pretty sure she’s planning on doing that often so yeah.”

“A-Are you okay?” She questioned as you smiled even more.

“Uh yeah i’m fine. Just kind of need to rest right now. Don’t worry about it though, i’ll find a different spot.”

“Y-Y-You can sit next to me... if you want?” She said as this was your chance.

“Really, thanks!” You say as you get up close to the couch. Looking up at her eyes you just had to. “Um... it’s not like I can get up there by myself.”

“R-Right.” She said before closing her eyes and laying her hand down next to you. With it near you, you step onto the platform. You can tell Flareon jumped while you did this, but clearly tried to keep her hand down.

“Okay uh... lift off!” You say thinking she would be okay with that. She lifted you off the ground and into the air. Her eyes poking open as she saw you on her hand.

Her hand was shaking, but as she lifted you up more she got more steady. Her eyes on you for a long time as she just holds you there.

For Flareon, she was a little scared of you before. After all, she hasn’t been the most courageous of the girls, in fact she was scared of small things like bugs as well as bigs things.

Not to mention, you were a different creature, and she didn’t know you. A true introvert.

Holding you in her hand though, Flareon felt relaxed. You weren’t mean, or angry. You were just small. Who was being nice.
111111111111111111111111.title: 24: The Introvert Sister

1111111111111111111111111.content:
You look at the giant girl holding you in her hand as she inspected you. You could see a small smile appear on her face as you guess that was a good thing. She was kind, and she was opening up to you.

“Uh... Flareon? You okay?” You say just wanting to make sure. She looked right at you for a long while before blinking her eyes.

“S-Sure. Sorry.” She said putting you down onto the couch. She let you down as her hand rested on the couch.

The comfy couch as you were excited. You needed a break due to Jolteon and this was over. You move around and relax. only for her fingers to curl up. Acting like a gate to you.

You take several steps as you look back at her. “Uh... Flareon?”

She lifted her hand as she started to talk once again. “You asked me what I was reading before. I’m reading a romance book.”

“A romance book?” You say as you suddenly turn and smile to her. You were gonna take the chance. “Sure, what’s it about!”

She smiled hearing that you were excited about hearing. She moved you around and rose her book showing the cover.

“It’s a story about a water type Pokemon and a fire type Pokemon falling in love. Although due to their types, they were from two different worlds. I’ve gotten to where they first find out that they love each other.” Flareon said as you smile.

“Not really into those kind of books, but glad to know you enjoy them.” You say back to her.

“I enjoy all types of books, every genre.” She said, as she was really sharing at this point. Guess holding you was the trigger for her to open. Maybe because she could just feel how small you were. “I’ve got bookshelves in my room and i’v read most of them.”

“Well, if you got one my side I would love to read it.” You say trying to make a joke, but she didn’t listen.

“Oh, right you probably don’t want to hear me go on and on about myself. You just want to rest after Jolteon right?”

“I mean, yeah of course. Although I would still love to hear your interests. You can move me around and sit me down onto the couch and then you can talk.”

“The couch?” She said as she was glad you were going to listen, however she wanted you somewhere else. She wanted you close and reward you.

A smile on her face as she brings you around. She brings you around and dropped you onto her stomach. Right onto her sweater as she leaned her body down. Even moving her hand around and covering you.

You were left confused, looking right up to her and seeing her smile down to you.

“Flareon?”

“Well, I-I hope this is more comfy for you.” She said as you were enjoying it.

“Yeah, kind of is.” You say relaxing your body. “So tell me about yourself.”

“Right, well I like books. Like I said, i’ve been reading them ever since I was little. I was young with Vaporeon and Jolteon, so when they were outside, I was reading.”

“With those two? Couldn’t be easy.” You say to her as she didn’t want to insult her sisters, but brought her face in.

“Don’t tell anyone, but when Jolteon asked me to play and I said I was busy, I was just reading books.” She said as she gave out a giggle. Wasn’t that big a thing, but the fact that she was treating it like one made yourself giggle.

You two talk around for a little while, as you were doing what works with girls the best. Asking about them. She told you mostly about her books, until the conversation went somewhere else.

“You knit?”

“I knit in my room. I don’t do it in front of the other girls.” She said a bit ashamed.

“In your room why?”

“Well, Jolteon would make fun of me, and Glaceon would use me. I just do it for peaceful times.” She said, both of them thinking about it for a while.

“Well, if you enjoy it keep doing it, don’t let your fear of what other people thinking stop you.”

“It doesn’t, I knit and I wear what I knit all the time.”

You thought about it for a long while, until you realise something.

“Wait, this sweater. Did you knit it, just to make sure.”

“W-W-Well it depends. Do you like it?”

“Uh... yeah it really is well made. Couldn’t even tell you did it by hand.” You say this to her as she smiles.

“I’m so glad you like it!! In fact... well if you need clothes, I might be able to make some little ones for you.”

You didn’t expect this, so of course you took your smile and plastered it on your face. “Really! That would be amazing! I’ve been wearing these clothes for the past few days. In fact, if you didn’t give this, I would be taking some tissues and wearing them.”

“Well, i’m g-glad I can help.” She said, not use to being thanked like this. She never spends this much time with people, not even her sisters.

You two talk and relax for a little bit more, until finally you closed your eyes and truly rested. You have no idea why, but her body was warm, even a bit hot. Almost like she had a fever or something.

However, you were going to go from hot to cold in a quick second, as you hear a voice.

“Flareon, i’m taking him now.” You get your sight and see Glaceon! The girl in a long light blue dress that covered most of her body.

“U-Uh... h-he wan-”

“Thank you!” Glaceon said grabbing you, before you could answer you were grabbed by her cold fingers. “You’ve had your time Flareon.”
1111111111111111111111111.title: 25: Cuddling With Flareon

11111111111111111111111111.content:
So you were being grabbed and taken somewhere else. You really should expected it, but it was not like you could do anything about it. You can just hope Flareon will stop Glaceon, but considering her sister isn’t confrontational, you doubt it.

Flareon had her mouth open several times, but it did not actually happen. Not a single word being uttered, as it was finished. Glaceon headed forward and moved into her room. Flareon having to go back to her book.

While this was happening, you were getting thrown and tossed around in the closed hand. Unable to do it as she took you.

Going into her room, she opened her fingers, letting you see the room. It was well kept, well decorated, but it was not enough to make you relaxed. You can’t help but worry.

“So Glaceon, what are you plannin-”

“I’m sorry, what did you call me?” She questioned, her face looking a bit serious.

“Uh... I called you Glaceon, is that not okay?”

The blue girl smiled. “You see, I think, considering your size it wouldn’t really make sense. Those my size call me Glaceon, but I feel you need to add a... certain title in front of it.”

“A title?” You say as you were confused. She smiled as she sat down, crossing her legs and relaxing.

“That’s right a title. Now how would you like to address me, Queen Glaceon, or Goddess Glaceon?”

She questioned this, as you were left confused.

“Uh... what?”

“Pick one, I will only let you address me as one. You see, Goddess makes me sound powerful, which I am, but Queen makes it sound like I am in charge, which I am.” She said as you were gonna guess she wants one of them.

“Queen I guess. Queen Glaceon, you happy about that?” You say as she relaxed.

“Very, now as your queen.” She said placing her hand to her chest. “I think some servitude is in order.”

“S-Servitude?”

“You know, your queen does not like repeating herself, you should really correct yourself about that.” She said as you were left confused.

“Why do you want that?”

“Oh, you have no idea about girls do you? Oh you are so cute, perfect for a servant. You see, while my sisters looked at you and thought, ‘oh he is so cute’ while I was thinking about something else. He can serve me.”

“Great.” You say simply, unable to get the smile about it. “So, what am I do-

“Oh you are cute, but extremely stupid. I want you to serve me. A foot rub I believe will be a good start.” She brought you down to the ground right in front of her feet. Sticking them out in front of you as you panic and make sure not to get touched about it. “Well get to it, you Queen demands it from you.”

“Fine i’ll do this, i’ll play along.” You say back to her as she laughs.

“Play along, no your Queen is forcing this on you.” She said leaning in. “You see, I usually force my will onto my sisters. From a very yo- Wait, start rubbing first.”

She stopped her monologue just to order you. Well you are gonna listen to the giant girl who can crush you under her cold foot. You move ahead and start rubbing her sole that was hung above you. Ignoring the large toes as you and her both know she can grab you with them.

“Perfect, now you see from a young age I taught myself how to trick my sisters. Do small and simple things for them and get a favour about it, and then cash the favour in for something much worse. It’s a bit annoying though, I will admit. Having to constantly do things for them just to get them to listen to me, and it can’t even be that extreme. I cleaned the entire house when my sisters were away, and they didn’t even consider my ‘Worship’ idea. That infuriated me.” She said as you were a little bit concerned. “You however, I don’t need manipulate, I just tell you to do it, and you do it. You know why, you are small and if you don’t listen I will step on you.”

“That... is very obvious.” You say as you just work on her sole.

“I will admit, you can work on your tone. Perhaps I need to train you, make you a better servant.” Glaceon said as you were not liking how she was talking about you. More like her property. You had a good mind to talk back to her, but given your size, your position and the fact that no one else will see you be quiet.

You work and rub her foot several times as she relaxed. Feeling your small effort on her foot as she liked it.

“So... you want to be treated like a queen?” You question to her speaking up.

“All girls do my little servant, they are just too afraid to admit it.” Glaceon said as she moved her feet around. Sticking the other foot in front and over your face. “Other one now.”

“Got it Queen.” You say as she smiled.

“I just love when you call me that. I did make the right choice with Queen didn’t I?” She said waiting for a response.

“Yeah you sure did. Tell me something Queen, do I still have to call you Queen when others around.”

“I expect you to address me exclusively from that from this point on.” She said finally as you guess that was true.

You work on her foot for even longer, until finally she dragged her feet back and away from you. Placing them as she smiled.

“Six out of ten for that foot rub, I expect better next time.” She said as you guess she was planning to do this again. “Next thing, is the nail polish. This will be interesting now.”
11111111111111111111111111.title: 26: The Queenly Sister

111111111111111111111111111.content:
She thankfully grabbed it herself, and not make you drag it all the way around. You were so weak that you were not excited for it. She came close and moved her fingers down to you. Opening the cap and giving you the brush. The brush was easy enough for her to hold it between two fingers.

For you though, it required a firm grip as it was like you were holding a broadsword. Not happy about it, but it was happening.

She placed her foot down in front of you as she smiles.

“Well, get to work.”

“Fine, my Queen.” You say with a bow, which was an attempt to suck up to her. You know that was the best thing for you. Moving closer you try to stick the brush into the opening, only to find that you could not really.

It was high above you. So climbing up the bottle, you stuck it in there. Wasn’t easy, but seems like Glaceon was willing to wait for you. She was willing to wait because of what she is going to get. Eventually you stuck it in, and it was covered.

With a jump down, you carried the brush over. Already a bit tired, and you haven’t even touched the first toe. “S-Sorry.”

“It’s fine, your Queen is a forgiving one, well... sometimes. Now she is, so get to work.”

“Understood.” You say finally as you start putting polish on her toes. With a shift left and right as you feel pretty good about this part.

You were able to not only even it out because you were so close, but made sure not to get any of the blue polish on her blue fur. Which was not very easy to see honestly.

Taking steps back from the paw, you look around and try to decide what you are gonna do next. Moving onto the next toe of course!

This was happening, so you were gonna try to get through it quick.

“Oh, you are so cute. Tell you what, why don’t you shower your Queen with compliments.” She said this as you paused, looking to her for a second.

“F-For real?” You say as she frowned. “Oh my mistake. For real, my Queen.”

“Do it, now. That is an order.”

“Oh my Queen, how beautiful you have.” You say doing what she wants. “By far the prettiest out of your sisters, envy of all.”

“Good, keep going.”

“I am so glad! That I get to worship your royalties. It is an honour of a lifetime. I totally want to be here right now.”

“Tone down the sarcasm, and try again.” She said as you guess you were going to do that.

Climbing up and getting more paint on the brush, you tell her. “Uh.. your hair is amazing, the amount of volume it has, not to mention the way it’s brushed.”

“Hmm... you are trying to hard. You have to make it natural.” She said as you were not really sure what she wants. Getting down you start brushing more toes.

“Well, you are pretty. Probably the most of the sisters. I doubt it’s fully the makeup.”

“Yes, keep talking about your Queen’s beauty.” She said with a smile.

So that is what happened, talking about her and polishing her toes. You were driven to finish it quick, so when you did you were so happy, even dropping the brush onto the carpet of the floor.

“There, done.” You say in between breaths as you were looking up to her. She was inspecting her work and she had to admit, it was good. “You paint toes much better than you rub feet. As for the compliment’s to your Queen, get better at that. When you can compliment a girl easily, you can get any one of them. Or us, if you were gonna go that way.”

“Yes my Queen. Am I done my Queen? I am, so tired my Queen.”

“Done, no we are just getting started!” A voice said as you blinked a couple of times. “After all, my fingernails I feel deserve the same treatment, and that’s an order from your Queen.” She said this with so much joy. “Now say ‘thank you Queen’”

“*Sigh*, Thank you Queen.”

“What a good day we have had! You are always welcome in your Queen’s kingdom!” Glaceon said happily, waving you away.   After a long day of servitude, you were finally getting free. She had about fifteen more things after painting her nails, just menial jobs. You were exhausted, more than it.

You just hope it’s getting late, you really need a sleep. Not to mention you were also very hungry. “Maybe I should find Eevee, I-”

“Oh good, you are free.” A voice said as you paused in the middle of the hallway. Turning your head and looking at a sister peeking through the doorway.

She was large, pink furred and had glasses on. It was Espeon.

“Can you come in here please?”

“I-I’m kind of tired, and hungry-”

“I have food in here. A much shorter journey than the kitchen downstairs.” She said as you guess she had a point. “You coming?”

“Yes my Quee- Espeon!” You say as she was not going to focus on that. She headed inside and you can hear her setting things up. You follow, while noting not to make a habit of this.

You walk into her doorway as you look into her room, clean and... a bit boring. Well instead for the long desk she had. She has more things there then in her room in general! It wasn’t like it was crowded either, everything was organised and you were a bit shocked.

Espeon was already sitting down, on a swivel chair as she moves around. Dropping her hand. “Good you are here, please get on.”

“Sure.” You say back to her getting on the hand. “What’s this about?”

“Simple really, I am planning on testing you.”
111111111111111111111111111.title: 27: Service For The Royal

info.description:
Eeveelution Giantess. This is a story just for me.

Much less of an interactive, as it's just gonna be me adding a line to a story ever now and then.

Description on the girls.

Eevee. She's still young, and just wants to play. Doesn't understand the whole appeal of boys thing, but does feel funny when with the little guy. Her body is just developing

Vaporeon: Oldest sister, flirty and sedcutive. Got large boobs and large ass and loves to show them off. Not to mention a fantastic swimmer, and just feels comfortable in the water

Jolteon: Sporty sister. Loves going for runs, and is a bit of a tomboy. Athelete's body. She's a teaser, and would sometimes be described as a bully. However to her it's just fun

Flareon: Shy girl who blushes easy. Hiding behind her hair most of the time and wearing her sweater. Soft spoken, however when she gets heated and passionate, it could be dangerous for everyone.

Espeon: Skinnest out of the girls, with glasses. Total bookworm, and would be more interested in studing if anything. Her sister's have called her too direct and too rude, but she doesn't see it

Umbreon: Goth and dark. has a very monotone voice and rarely shows emotion. She could be totally excited, but none of her sister's will ever see it, but the tiny might.

Leafeon: The most down to earth girl. Understanding, kind, lovely. Mostly works on her large garden. She cleans up the house and scolds the others as she takes a motherly role.

Glaceon: Glaceon is rude, condescending and cheeky. She keeps up her appearance well and can be described as cold. Has one dream, to be treated like a queen.

Sylveon: The second yongest sister, but has the biggest pair of the lot. Excitably, happy and very playful, always able to get a laugh and a giggle from all the other sisters
